programme.title: Dog Whisperer

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Old and new cases that show the process for adopting a dog, introducing one to the home, setting rules and boundaries and dealing with the loss of a pet.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A pit bull is aggressive toward people and dogs; a dachshund mix exhibits aggression at feeding time and when it comes time to trim his nails.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar Millan investigates the case of a bulldog named Bella who has become aggressive ever since her owner's five-month rehab stint.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A professional dog groomer reaches out to Cesar for help with three of her toughest clients; Cesar helps a couple with their head-strong pitbull.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Puppy mills produce millions of dogs; Ceaser works with an animal rights group to rescue and rehabilitate some pups.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar Millan helps Suzie Dove Miles, who has recently adopted a Doberman who is fearful of literally everything.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Family dogs brawl with each other; a dog torments a child; a five-legged miniature pinscher has an aggressive attitude.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar attempts to introduce Roscoe, an agoraphobic Akita who is too scared to leave the house and garden and has never been for a walk, to the outside world.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Weimaraner eats everything in sight; a yellow Lab's excess energy is expressed destructively; an Australian shepherd is unable to socialize with other dogs.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Three canines with issues at a dog-friendly ad agency office; a border collie mix becomes excited and unresponsive to commands when in her owner's truck.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar helps a man get over a fear of dogs so he can finally fulfill his children's request to adopt one of their own.

programme.sub-title: My Life on the Dog List

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Two troubled dogs, and their families, win sessions with Cesar after auditioning at a pet store in Orange County, Calif.

programme.desc: A Doberman/Lab and a pit bull develop behavioral issues after not being walked for months; an Italian greyhound acts aggressively toward the men of the house.

programme.desc: Dave Glassman adopts pit bulls Blackjack and Memphis together, but one day during a barking fit, the two dogs turn on each other.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar works to dial down the bad behaviors of four problem dogs who won sessions at the PETCO auditions.

programme.desc: Cesar celebrates the show's 100th episode with a grand reunion of many of the past guests and their dogs.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Daschund Lotus is very territorial; his aggression sends his owner Chari to the hospital; Cesar makes a house call to see Joey, a German Shepard who is territorial over the second story of his owner's home.
